item.title: Please PVP safe area
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

A correct method would be:

public boolean nonWildPvP() { if (absX >= 3205 && absX <= 3209 && absY >= 3218 && absY <= 3226) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Yours will just throw errors:

public boolean nonWildPvP() { if ((absX >= 3205 && absX <= 3209 && absY >= 3218 && absY <= 3226) return true; } else { return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Please PVP safe area
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

My plesure!
First search in client.java:

Type == 2

you should find this:

if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) && (absX >= 3187 && absX <= 3194 && absY >= 3958 && absY <=3962)) { return true; } } return false; }
now add the coords next to the list …
or ill just do it for you:

if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942) && (absX >= 3187 && absX <= 3194 && absY >= 3958 && absY <=3962 && (absX >= 3205 && absX <= 3209 && absY >= 3218 && absY <= 3226)) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	}

if that didnt work you try adding it alone, idk really…
